Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
formula: a(n) = 72*n + a(n-1) with a(0)=5. [_Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 12 2010]G.f. ( -5-62*x-5*x^2 ) / (x-1)^3. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 19 2013
